p: Endoperoxy cuparene-type sesquiterpenoids ( 97 and 98, structures are shown in Figure 6, and activity is shown in Table 7) were identified from the Japanese liverwort Jungermannia infusca [ 184, 185]. The chamigranes called merulin B ( 99) and C ( 100) have been found in an extract of the culture broth of a Thai mangrove-derived fungus [ 186, 187].
